dcterms:description: The PSID dataset is used to estimate the persistence of real earnings over the period from 1976 to 1995, allowing for individual fixed effects and heterogeneous autoregressive coefficients.
dcterms:title: PSID dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Meghir
L. Pistaferri
dcterms:description: The earnings dynamics dataset refers to various studies on earnings dynamics, particularly the work by Meghir and Pistaferri (2004) which investigates income variance dynamics and heterogeneity.
dcterms:title: Earnings dynamics dataset

dcterms:description: The Monte Carlo experiments dataset consists of datasets generated for Monte Carlo simulations to investigate the small sample properties of the proposed estimators.
dcterms:title: Monte Carlo experiments dataset
